name: UserActivity
desc: The context for playing a media queue.

items.name: activityType
items.desc: A reverse-DNS string that uniquely identifies the activity. Provide the same activity types your app specifies in NSUserActivity objects.

items.name: title
items.desc: A short description of this activity for logging or debugging purposes.

items.name: userInfo
items.desc: Additional data your service needs to fulfill requests to Get a Media Queue.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the SiriKitMediaAPI library this activity conforms to.
